title: AI Layoffs Surge in Tech Sector üìâ
full: Over 150,000 layoffs were recorded in October 2025 across major U.S. companies, many citing AI-driven automation as a factor. Experts say this trend highlights the urgent need for reskilling in AI-related fields.

title: Google Expands Gemini AI Features üöÄ
full: Google unveiled major upgrades to its Gemini model, integrating deeper Workspace tools and releasing a new AI Studio for easy app prototyping. Gemini Enterprise now powers Docs, Sheets, and Gmail AI assistants.

title: MIT Report Warns of AI Energy Impact üå±
full: MIT researchers raised concerns about the rising carbon footprint of large AI models. They urged data centers to use greener energy and model compression to reduce emissions.

title: Google Search Adds Visual AI Mode üîç
